Class ResponseWriter

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writer

    public class ResponseWriter
extends AbstractOutputStreamWriter
    Writes to the output stream of a servlet response.

                                   throws AluminumException

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: Writer
        Removes all objects that have been written to this writer since the last time it was flushed. Not all writers support this operation.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface Writer
        Overrides:
        clear in class AbstractWriter
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this writer is closed or can't be cleared

      • closeOutputStream

        protected void closeOutputStream()
        Description copied from class: AbstractOutputStreamWriter
        Closes the output stream. This method can be overridden by subclasses that want to keep their output streams open.
